Name: Fight For Eden
About the game: Fight For Eden is a fantasy action-RPG VR game where you will follow the story of a young orc enrolled to fight against the half elves' oppression. VR Skills : Specific actions done by the player in real life translated as impressive skills in the virtual world. Twist of faith, twist of death, earth shaker. Combat : Can use multiple melee weapons and shield. Think at strategies on how to approach multiple enemies, overcome their abilities and guide your team to achieve victory. Weapons : multiple melee weapons with different attributes unlocked as the story progresses. Story : Explore the history of Asquebesc region, speak with charismatic characters to find untold secrets about their lives and relationships.
Meta Title: Fight For Eden: Dec 18, 2020, Andonis Gaja and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Fight For Eden? Check out the release date (Dec 18, 2020), developer insights from Andonis Gaja, and a complete game summary.
